reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool Fan, Moves a lot of air, with fun extras!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Really Cool little fan that moves a lot of air! It has TWO! Different fans in one enclosure! The two sets of blades spin to really get the air going! Even on the very lowest setting it gives a strong breeze! I haven’t used it in the highest setting because i haven’t needed it! The fan also oscillates and tilts to get the perfect angle. It’s really cool that you can set the fan manually via the dial AND STILL USE THE REMOTE TO ADJUST IT! Fan can also be hung upside down with the folding hook! The kids LOVE the light settings and light shows. It is a nice feature if you need to set the fan somewhere on the floor in the dark…easily prevents tripping over the fan in the middle of the night! Battery lasts a long time on the lowest setting and it will run if plugged in and keep the battery charged. You can also use it to charge or power other items via usb port. The Fan Base has a little slot that has been driving me crazy! I don’t know what it does or why it’s there? It’s not listed on the manual. Doesn’t interfere with use, just funny that it’s there and obvious, but don’t know why? The other feature i wish was added would be the ability to dim the “white” light for a dimmer night time use. Wonderful little fan!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great rechargeable fan.
reviews.reviewText: Makes a great camping fan. I chose the dial type instead of remote control which is just another item that can get lost. Ran full speed eight hours, recharges in less than 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars perfect for stationary long term use
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this after my long time, light weight battery-operated fan kicked the bucket after 6+ years. This fan worked well, moved air nicely, and the color-changing lights were fabulous. It was on the heavier side of what I wanted so I attached it to my pop-up tent above my kitchen set up and it was perfect. Over a 5-day camping trip, it charged several small USB items and my cell phone several times. I loved changing the light color to red/purple at night so it wasn't so harsh and you could still see while trying to find your camp site at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for tent!
reviews.reviewText: Using to light up a tent and circulate air to keep condensation down. Battery run time is great and lights are perfect brightness. This has no problem lighting up a 10x12 space. Love the fact it can hang.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little fan
reviews.reviewText: Great fan and love that it has a remote

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to use in my RV while boondocking. It has 3 fan speeds and a light with 3 levels of brightness. It can either stand alone on a flat surface, or hang from the attached hook. It also has a remote control with onboard storage which makes it even more versatile.First, I charged it completely and ran it on low fan speed to see how long it would run on a full charge. It ran just short of 24 hours! Then, it took 6 hours to fully charge via the USB plug.I'm very happy with the quality and performance of this rechargeable fan and recommend it highly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works like it should. Light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great battery life
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! I was pleasantly surprised by the battery life. Used it numerous times before needing to recharge, sometimes on a higher speed for hours at a time. And you can really stretch the battery life on a lower speed, which was still comfortable. Great tent fan for camping, and the two color temperature (warm white and cool white) options for the light is a great feature. Multiple brightness settings as well. The hanging hook could be designed better so you may want to use a carabiner to attach it to something overhead.
